text: Mayankote Kelath Narayanan (born 10 March 1934) is an Indian politician. He was National Security Adviser of India from 2005 to 2010. Subsequently he served as Governor of West Bengal from 2010 to 2014. From 2010 to 2014, he was the Governor of West Bengal. ==References== ==Other websites== Category:1934 births Category:Living people Category:Governors of West Bengal Category:Malayali people
title: M. K. Narayanan
